OpenSim::CMCTool

CMCTool Class Reference

#include <CMCTool.h>

Inheritance diagram for CMCTool:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

An abstract class for specifying the interface for an investigation.

Author:
Frank C. Anderson
Version:
1.0
